Posts.Content: Sep 5, 2013 12:55PM Dan7 wrote: Hello, Had the op, nearer end of radiotherapy. Im seeing light at the end of the tunnel. Now all i have to worry about is loosing the excess weight gained during treatment. Also im so delighted with my hair growing back even though it is all white. For you all out there, do not despair there is hope and I am proof of it.
Posts.Title: December 2012 chemo group beckstar18 Bren58

Posts.Content: Dec 30, 2012 02:13PM Dan7 wrote: Hi, just been diagnosed with breast cancer on my birthday 27th december. Very confused and sad. Told some of my friends who are all very supportive. My family have rallied round too but i keep crying all the time, can't help it. I am so very scared! Should start chemo end of January. I don't understand the grading or stages. What is grade 3? Also I have a constant dull pain, is this normal? Thank you for your help.
